sub_title: Project Manager Design & Build at P&P Projects
summary:
I am a Project Manager in the Themed Entertainment industry, using my background in (theme park) operations and concept development, to lead the development of spectacular, moving and authentic experiences and rides within theme parks, zoos, museums and other leisure destinations from start to finish.

My main focus lies in Design-Build projects for Scenic Show Sets in which I am leading multidisciplinary teams consisting of 3D artist, designers, engineers, project coordinators, procurement officers, production managers and various subcontractors in audio-, video-, lighting and show control, from the initial concept and designs all the way to show set fabrication, installation and hand-over for clients world-wide.

education.field_of_study: Leisure Management, Attraction & Theme Park Management

awards.title: Best Novelty in an Amusement Park in Europe 2023
awards.description: Parque Warner Madrid's „Batman: Gotham City Escape" received the "Best Novelty in an Amusement Park in Europe“-audience award from Worldofparks.eu, Germany's biggest Leisure website.

awards.title: Thea Award for Outstanding Achievement
awards.description: Won the Thea Award for Outstanding Achievement in the category Attraction Limited Budget with Underlandet in Liseberg, Gothenburg, Sweden.

awards.title: Park World Excellence Award 2021 - Best Darkride and/or Multimedia Experience
awards.description: Liseberg's Underlandet received the Best New Darkride/Multimedia Experience 2021 award. P&P Projects was responsible for design assist, technical design, construction and installation of theming, AV hardware, show lighting and show control.

awards.title: European Star Award - Best New Ride 2021
awards.description: Liseberg's Underlandet received the Best New Ride 2021 award during the IAAPA Europe Expo in Barcelona. P&P Projects was responsible for design assist, technical design, construction and installation of theming, AV hardware, show lighting and show control.

awards.title: European Star Award - Best New Rollercoaster 2021 Runner-Up
awards.description: Runner-up Award for Movie Park Studio Tour in Movie Park Germany. P&P Projects was responsible for design assist, technical design, construction and installation of theming, AV hardware, show lighting and show control.

awards.title: Top 20 Fastest Growing Stores - Europe
awards.description: Domino's Helmond Brandevoort saw a growth of +230% compared to June 2018 (one full year) and was therefore included as number 7 of the fastest growing European stores.

awards.title: Shift of the Week Award
awards.description: Three time award winner of best Shift of the Week; criteria based on service, NPS, GPS and product quality.

certifications.name: Bachelor of Arts (BA)/Business Administration (BBA) in Leisure Management

projects.title: Classified Projects - P&P Projects
projects.description: Involved with various design, engineering, production and installation projects as Project Manager, Design Coordinator, Site Manager and Creative Producer for theme parks, cruise ships and museums in Europe, Middle-East, North- and Central America. Projects include various world renowned intellectual property, ranging from the smallest rodents to the most impressive superheroes.

contributors.headline: Project Manager Design & Build at P&P Projects

projects.title: Batman Gotham City Escape - Parque Warner Madrid
projects.description:
Initially leading the concept development, concept design, schematic design and graphic design of the ride, shop, area and F&B kiosk as Project Manager and Creative Producer.

During construction I led the effort for technical design, engineering, structural calculations and production of: show sets, special effects, show action equipment and animated figures. 

As on-site Project Manager I've led multidisciplinary teams and acted as on-site Art Director during the installation of all show sets, show lighting, audio- and video equipment, show control and on-site paint works.

Besides this, I am responsible for subvendors for Show Lighting, Audio and Video Hardware, Show Control and all Video- and Audio Content. 

This partly renovated, partly new-to-build darkride/high speed rollercoaster opened in May 2023.

contributors.headline: Project Manager Design & Build at P&P Projects

projects.title: Children Water Play Area - Regional Dutch Community Pool
projects.description: Leading the design effort of re-creating an existing children play area/pool area within a regional community pool with the local government as client. Concepting, 2D- and 3D Design executed in close collaboration with the architects of the pool/building.

contributors.headline: Project Manager Design & Build at P&P Projects

projects.title: Disney Wish - Various Show Set Design, Fabrication and Installation
projects.description:
Project Coordinator/Project Manager in the (3D) design and show set fabrication for multiple rooms and water attractions within the Disney Cruise Line's newest vessel, Disney Wish. Additionally, P&P was responsible for installation of show sets produced by others and scenic paint throughout the whole ship.

The Disney Wish has set sail on its first cruise in 2022.

contributors.headline: Project Manager Design & Build at P&P Projects

projects.title: Walkthrough Attraction - Middle East Theme Park
projects.description: Acting as both Project Manager and Show Producer for the Concept Development & Concept- and Schematic Design of a heavily story-based walk-through attraction/animal exhibit combination based on a local legend for a new-to-build theme park resort in the Middle East. Efforts included storyboarding, 2D concepting, 3D design, graphic design, consultancy on animal exhibits, interactive design and technical schematic design.

contributors.headline: Project Manager Design & Build at P&P Projects

profile_positions.description:
As Project Manager I lead projects ranging from smaller to multi-million EUR budgets for clients in (North) America, Europe and Asia.  I am responsible for the total project, including for example, scheduling, communication, design coordination, financing and quality control. I work together with multidisciplinary teams consisting of Procurement Officers, Project Coordinators/Assistants, Engineers, Designers and our workshop team together with the Production Managers.  

Within these projects I additionally act as Creative Producer, being responsible for storytelling and keeping the creative intent as close as possible to the initial concept. 

Besides this I am heavily involved in business development, marketing and supervising interns.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Design & Build

profile_positions.location: Helmond-West en Brandevoort (gedeeltelijk), Provincie Noord-Brabant, Nederland
profile_positions.description:
I have been responsible for the daily operation of two stores whilst taking care of quality and safety control (HACCP, BHV), coaching, motivating, training and leading 90 (young) employees and 10 shift supervisors, training crew trainers, shift leaders and (assistant) managers of four (4) stores, HR, recruitment and administration. 

Next to that, I acted as the local store marketeer, therefore being responsible for (online) customer service, marketing & communication.

Finally, I initiated and led internal projects, e.g., improving quality and service, cost control, GPS, efficiency and performance, retention of staff, crew involvement, standardizing processes and the creation of manager manuals.
profile_positions.title: Store Manager & Local Store Marketeer

profile_positions.description: Writing my thesis by conducting a research on the relationship between the degrees of theming/experience and (direct, indirect) economical impact, whilst creating new sales documents and presentations, an implementation plan and market analysis, a design manual for different products as minigolfs, assisting in creative projects, performing maintenance checks on site and conducting an extra research regarding sales processes and prospects.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Intern Design & Sales

profile_positions.description: Being entrepreneurs in a small (3 person) business was a huge and adventurous step which I enjoyed very much. After creating products, price ranges, communication standards and communication channels as the website and social media, I was responsible for acquisition and communication with customers throughout the projects, social media marketing and writing blogs for entrepreneurs on branding and guest experience.
profile_positions.title: Co-Owner & Business Developer

profile_positions.location: Magic Kingdom, Walt Disney World (Orlando, Florida)
